text:
0 may be a prequel to the whole series, but it's littered with references and nods to later entries in the series, and playing it first could possibly hamper your enjoyment of the later entries. Also, as someone else said, 0 is one of the most recent games in the series, and either it or kiwami are arguably the most refined games gameplay wise. This, of course, means that playing hte later numbered entries in the series requires going from this heavily refined gameplay back to the unrefined, more clunky gameplay of previous entries.

In an ideal world, I'd recommend starting at yakuza 1 (the original) and working your way through in release order, but that is a lot of games to get through, so I'd instead recommend 4 to start, since they include recaps of the previous games.
